whyMe.description: I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member of your team.

Skills.challengeMeHidden: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need

MyProjects.headLine: Meine Projekte
MyProjects.joinText: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
MyProjects.ElPolloLocoText: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and Tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
